name: PublishToAzureServiceBus
description: Sends a message to azure service bus using a service connection (no agent required).
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure service bus connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Azure Service Bus connection.

inputs.name: signPayload
inputs.label: Sign the Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set to true, message will be signed provided a private certificate.

inputs.name: certificateString
inputs.label: Certificate Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: Certificate pulled in from Key Vault store. Please create a variable group that is linked to an Azure Key Vault, which contains a variable, whose value is the certificate. You can do this by going to Library -> Variable group -> + Variable group -> Select 'Link secrets from an Azure key vault as variables' -> Select your Azure subscription -> Select the key vault name -> Ensure that the variable with the certificate is selected. You can also define regular/secret variable which will contain certificate content as string.

inputs.name: signatureKey
inputs.label: Signature Property Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Key where you want signature to be in Message Properties. If left Empty, default is 'signature' in message properties

inputs.name: waitForCompletion
inputs.label: Wait for task completion
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will wait for TaskCompleted event for the specified task timeout.
